page.title: 10D.B. SCHOOL CONTD.
page.content: First break is twenty minutes long and starts at ten thirty and finishes at ten fifty. For the lower school, lunch break starts at eleven forty five and the upper school at twelve. They both finish at one o'clock. Last break starts at two ten and finishes at two twenty-five. The lower school finishes at three fifteen and the upper three thirty. The school starts at the age of five and finishes at twelve. There are also{prefects.}The school tie is light blue and dark blue, with a gold stripe. You can learn to play the guitar, violin, descant and treble recorders, tuba, bass, trumpet and percussion instruments.
